query:
ALTER TABLE purchase_orders 
ADD COLUMN rejectedBy INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN rejectedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN rejectionReason TEXT NULL;

ALTER TABLE spare_parts_transactions 
ADD COLUMN exportPurpose ENUM('repair', 'borrow', 'destroy', 'normal') DEFAULT 'normal',
ADD COLUMN borrowerName VARCHAR(255) NULL,
ADD COLUMN borrowerDepartment VARCHAR(255) NULL,
ADD COLUMN expectedReturnDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN actualReturnDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN returnedQuantity INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN returnStatus ENUM('pending', 'partial', 'completed') DEFAULT 'pending',
ADD COLUMN relatedTransactionId INT NULL;

ADD COLUMN rejectionReason TEXT NULL;

ALTER TABLE spare_parts_transactions 
ADD COLUMN exportPurpose ENUM('repair', 'borrow', 'destroy', 'normal') DEFAULT 'normal',

ADD COLUMN borrowerDepartment VARCHAR(255) NULL,
ADD COLUMN expectedReturnDate TIMESTAMP NULL,

ADD COLUMN returnStatus ENUM('pending', 'partial', 'completed') DEFAULT 'pending',
ADD COLUMN relatedTransactionId INT NULL;
